name: Sunil
title: Software Development Engineer
other_titles: Software Developer, Frontend Developer, Backend Developer, Full Stack Developer
summary: Sunil is a highly skilled Software Development Engineer (SDE) known for crafting innovative software solutions. With expertise in Frontend(HTML, CSS, JS, ReactJS, NextJS) and Backend technologies(NodeJS, Microservices), He excels in delivering high-quality applications that meet user needs and drive business success.

addresses.name: Home
addresses.overview: Welcome to our lovely home located in the heart of India, Delhi, a serene neighborhood known for its friendly community and beautiful parks.

skills.name: PL/SQL
skills.description: PL/SQL (Procedural Language/Structured Query Language) is an extension of SQL used for writing procedural code in the Oracle database. It provides the ability to create stored procedures, functions, triggers, and packages, allowing for the development of complex and powerful database-driven applications.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Implemented stored procedures and triggers in PL/SQL to automate data processing tasks and enforce business rules within an enterprise application.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Developed custom functions and packages in PL/SQL to optimize database performance and improve data retrieval efficiency in a large-scale data warehouse.

experience.details: Over 3 years of experience working with PL/SQL in Oracle database environments. Proficient in writing and optimizing stored procedures, functions, and packages for efficient data management and application development.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: John's expertise in PL/SQL has been invaluable to our team. His ability to write efficient and maintainable stored procedures and triggers has greatly enhanced our database performance and application reliability.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring new features and best practices in PL/SQL development to stay updated with the latest advancements in database programming and optimization.

skills.name: Node.js
skills.description: Node.js is a runtime environment that allows developers to run JavaScript code server-side. It is built on the V8 JavaScript engine and provides a non-blocking, event-driven architecture, making it ideal for building scalable and high-performance network applications.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Developed a RESTful API using Node.js and Express.js, providing data access and manipulation for a web application.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Built a real-time chat application with Node.js and Socket.IO, enabling users to communicate instantly with each other.

experience.details: Over 3 years of experience working with Node.js in various web development projects. Proficient in building backend services, RESTful APIs, and real-time applications using Node.js ecosystem.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: John's expertise in Node.js has been instrumental in our project's success. His ability to build scalable and efficient backend services has significantly improved our application's performance and reliability.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring new features and best practices in Node.js ecosystem to stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in server-side development.

skills.name: Leaflet.js
skills.description: Leaflet.js is an open-source JavaScript library for interactive maps. It provides a lightweight and versatile solution for integrating maps into web applications, with support for various map providers, markers, layers, and interactions.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Implemented Leaflet.js for displaying interactive maps on a tourism website, allowing users to explore destinations and points of interest.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Utilized Leaflet.js for visualizing geographical data on a real estate platform, enabling users to search for properties and view nearby amenities.

experience.details: Over 2 years of experience working with Leaflet.js in various web development projects. Proficient in integrating Leaflet.js with custom data sources and enhancing maps with additional features.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: John's proficiency in Leaflet.js has been crucial to our projects involving map integration. His ability to work with complex geographical data and customize map interactions has greatly improved our user experience.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring new features and updates in Leaflet.js to leverage its capabilities for building rich and interactive map-based applications.

skills.name: Next.js
skills.description: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and other advanced features to build modern web applications. It provides built-in support for routing, data fetching, and code splitting, making it easy to create fast, SEO-friendly, and scalable applications.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Developed a blog website using Next.js, implementing server-side rendering for improved SEO and performance. Integrated with a headless CMS for content management and deployed on a cloud platform.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Built an e-commerce platform with Next.js, leveraging static site generation to pre-render product pages and optimize loading speed. Integrated with a backend API for dynamic data fetching and management.

experience.details: Over 2 years of experience working with Next.js in various web development projects. Proficient in leveraging Next.js features such as SSR, SSG, dynamic routing, and API routes to build high-performance and SEO-friendly applications.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: Alice's expertise in Next.js has been invaluable to our team. Her ability to leverage Next.js features and optimize performance has resulted in the successful delivery of several projects.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring advanced Next.js techniques and best practices to further enhance efficiency, scalability, and performance in web applications.

skills.name: Shadcn/UI
skills.description: A collection of beautifully designed components that can be easily copied and pasted into your Next.js apps. These components are accessible, customizable, and open source, providing flexibility and freedom in building UIs tailored to your project needs.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Integrated custom components from the collection into an e-commerce website, enhancing user experience and streamlining development.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Utilized reusable components for a blog platform, speeding up development time and ensuring consistency in design.

experience.details: Over 2 years of experience using custom reusable components in various Next.js projects. Proficient in integrating and customizing components to meet specific project requirements.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: John's expertise in using custom reusable components has been invaluable to our team. His ability to quickly integrate and customize components has accelerated our development process and improved overall project quality.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring new design patterns and best practices to enhance the usability and versatility of custom reusable components in Next.js applications.

skills.name: ReactJS
skills.description: ReactJS is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, developed by Facebook. It allows developers to create reusable UI components and manage the state of the application efficiently. React follows a component-based architecture, enabling the development of complex and interactive web applications with ease.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Developed a single-page application for a social networking platform using ReactJS, incorporating features such as user authentication, real-time updates, and interactive feeds.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Implemented a responsive e-commerce website using ReactJS, integrating with a backend API to fetch product data and manage user interactions.

experience.details: Over 3 years of experience working with ReactJS in various web development projects. Proficient in building reusable components, managing state and props, and integrating with external APIs.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: John's proficiency in ReactJS is commendable. His ability to design and implement complex UI components with React has significantly contributed to the success of our projects.

skills.continuousLearning: Staying updated with the latest ReactJS features and best practices to deliver cutting-edge solutions and optimize performance in web applications.

skills.name: Material-UI (MUI)
skills.description: Material-UI, also known as MUI, is a popular React UI framework based on Google's Material Design guidelines. It provides a set of pre-designed components and styles for building modern, responsive, and visually appealing user interfaces.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Developed a dashboard application using Material-UI, leveraging its rich set of components for data visualization and user interaction. Implemented responsive design principles for optimal viewing across devices.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Built a portfolio website with Material-UI, utilizing its grid system and typography styles to create a professional and visually appealing layout. Integrated with third-party APIs for content aggregation.

experience.details: Over 3 years of experience working with Material-UI in various web development projects. Proficient in customizing and extending Material-UI components to meet specific design requirements and branding guidelines.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: David's expertise in Material-UI has been instrumental in our project's success. His proficiency in leveraging Material-UI components and theming capabilities has enabled us to deliver polished and consistent user interfaces.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring new features and updates in Material-UI to stay updated with the latest design trends and best practices in UI development.

skills.name: Ant Design
skills.description: Ant Design is a popular React UI library developed by Ant Group. It provides a comprehensive set of components and design guidelines for building enterprise-level web applications with efficiency and consistency.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Implemented a data management system using Ant Design, leveraging its table, form, and modal components for CRUD operations. Customized the design and layout to align with the project's branding.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Developed a customer relationship management (CRM) application with Ant Design, incorporating its advanced charting and data visualization components. Ensured accessibility and responsiveness for diverse user groups.

experience.details: Over 2 years of experience working with Ant Design in various web development projects. Skilled in utilizing Ant Design components and layout systems to streamline UI development and improve user experience.

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: Emily's expertise in Ant Design has been invaluable to our team. Her proficiency in utilizing Ant Design components and design principles has enabled us to deliver visually stunning and highly functional user interfaces.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring new features and updates in Ant Design to leverage its capabilities for designing scalable and maintainable UI components in React applications.

skills.name: Tailwind CSS
skills.description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that allows you to build custom designs without having to leave your HTML. It provides a wide range of pre-designed utility classes that you can apply directly to your HTML elements, enabling rapid development and customization of responsive and accessible user interfaces.

relevantProjects.name: Project X
relevantProjects.description: Developed a modern website for an e-commerce platform using Tailwind CSS, achieving a visually appealing and responsive design across various devices.

relevantProjects.name: Project Y
relevantProjects.description: Implemented a dashboard interface for a data visualization tool using Tailwind CSS, ensuring consistency and scalability in design elements.

experience.details: Over 2 years of experience working with Tailwind CSS in various web development projects. Proficient in leveraging Tailwind CSS utility classes to streamline the styling process and achieve desired design outcomes.

skills.examplesOrSamples:
// Example of using Tailwind CSS utility classes to create a button
<button class='bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded'>Button</button>

endorsementsOrRecommendations.quote: Jane's expertise in Tailwind CSS has been invaluable to our team. Her ability to harness the power of Tailwind's utility classes has significantly sped up our development process and improved the maintainability of our codebase.

skills.continuousLearning: Continuously exploring advanced techniques and best practices in Tailwind CSS to further enhance efficiency and productivity in frontend development projects.

experience.name: UI Development for Online Payment using EBT Card
experience.description: During my internship at HBSS, I spearheaded the development of a user interface (UI) for online payment using EBT Card. This project aimed to provide users with a convenient and secure platform for conducting transactions and checking card balances. Leveraging the CARDKNOX API for EBT type transactions, I ensured robust payment processing capabilities while maintaining the highest standards of security. By implementing intuitive user flows and integrating features for card balance checking, I contributed to enhancing the overall payment experience for users. This project reflects HBSS's commitment to delivering innovative and user-friendly payment solutions.

projects.name: React Game: Catch the Moving Object
projects.description: Embark on an exciting adventure with our React-based game, where every click counts! Developed by Sunil, this engaging game challenges players to test their reflexes and agility as they attempt to catch a moving object within a limited time frame.
achievements: Implemented dynamic gameplay mechanics
Ensured seamless integration with React components
key_features: Dynamic Gameplay: Experience the thrill of the chase as a single game object moves randomly across the screen at varying speeds.
Configurable Settings: Customize your gaming experience by adjusting the speed and duration of the game before starting.
Win or Lose: Test your reflexes and aim to click on the moving object within the specified time limit.
why: Fun and Challenging: Our React game offers a fun and challenging experience for players of all ages.
Improves Reflexes: Sharpen your reflexes and hand-eye coordination as you strive to click on the moving object in time.
Easy to Play, Hard to Master: While the concept is simple, mastering the game requires precision and timing.

projects.name: Chrome Extension: YouTube Word Search
projects.description: Introducing our Chrome extension: YouTube Word Search! Developed by Sunil, this handy tool enhances your browsing experience by allowing you to seamlessly search for selected words on YouTube with just a right-click.
achievements: Enhanced user browsing experience
Streamlined access to YouTube search functionality
key_features: Seamless Integration: Enjoy effortless access to YouTube search functionality directly from your browser's context menu.
Enhanced Browsing Experience: Quickly search for selected words on YouTube without leaving your current browsing session.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension provides a simple and intuitive interface, making it easy for users to perform word searches on YouTube.
why: Convenience: Our Chrome extension saves you time by eliminating the need to manually copy and paste words into the YouTube search bar.
Efficiency: With just a right-click, you can instantly search for any selected word on YouTube, allowing you to find relevant content with ease.
Customization: Tailor your browsing experience by searching for specific words or phrases on YouTube, empowering you to discover content that matters to you.

projects.name: NPM Library: scrollbar-slider
projects.description: Introducing scrollbar-slider, a customizable React component that provides carousel functionality with a scrollbar to quickly navigate between slides. Developed by Sunil, scrollbar-slider enhances your web applications with a sleek and user-friendly slider feature.
responsibilities: Integration of carousel and scrollbar functionality
achievements: Enhanced user experience with dynamic slide navigation
Improved accessibility with customizable scrollbar
key_features: Dynamic Carousel: Seamlessly navigate between slides with carousel functionality.
Customizable Scrollbar: Quickly scroll through slides using the customizable scrollbar.
User-Friendly Interface: scrollbar-slider provides an intuitive interface, making it easy for users to interact with the carousel.
why: Enhanced User Experience: scrollbar-slider enhances user engagement and interaction on web applications.
Increased Flexibility: Customize the carousel and scrollbar to suit the specific needs and design requirements of your project.
Simplified Implementation: Easily integrate scrollbar-slider into your React applications to add carousel functionality with minimal effort.

projects.name: Texitor: A User-Friendly Persistent Notepad
projects.icon: background: transparent url(/static/projects/texitor/f-logo.png) 1px 26px / 100% 40% no-repeat; transform: rotate(45deg)
projects.description: Texitor is a modern and intuitive notepad application designed to streamline your note-taking experience. What sets Texitor apart is its innovative use of the IndexedDB API in JavaScript, allowing for seamless and persistent storage of your notes directly within your browser.
responsibilities: Created user friendly UI in HTML, CSS
Implemented all CRUD operations using Javascript and IndexedDB
achievements: Achievement 1
Achievement 2
key_features: Create Notes Texitor empowers you to quickly jot down your thoughts, ideas, or important information with ease. With just a few clicks, you can create new notes and start capturing your thoughts in real-time.

Save and Update: Say goodbye to the fear of losing your notes. Texitor leverages the power of IndexedDB to automatically save your notes as you type. You can update your notes effortlessly, and Texitor ensures that your changes are preserved for future reference.

Read Notes: Texitor provides a clean and clutter-free interface for reading your notes. Whether you're revisiting old ideas or reviewing important information, Texitor offers a seamless reading experience, allowing you to focus on the content that matters most.

Persistent Storage: Texitor takes advantage of the IndexedDB API, a powerful browser-based database, to store your notes locally on your device. While Texitor ensures that your notes are accessible across browser sessions, please note that they may not be available when offline.
why: User-Friendly Interface: Texitor features an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, making it suitable for users of all skill levels. Whether you're a student, professional, or creative thinker, Texitor adapts to your needs, providing a hassle-free note-taking experience.

Privacy and Security: Your privacy and security are our top priorities. Texitor stores your notes locally on your device, ensuring that your sensitive information remains private and secure. With Texitor, you can take notes with confidence, knowing that your data is protected.

Seamless Integration: Texitor seamlessly integrates into your browser, allowing you to access your notes from anywhere, at any time. Whether you're using Texitor on your desktop, laptop, or mobile device, your notes are always within reach, enabling you to stay organized and productive on the go.
